CONSCIOUS MOVIES AND MEANINGFUL CONVERSATION - Hope to see you there!
All are Welcome!

@ The Center of Light - 7:30PM FREE
97 Perkins Street in Jamaica Plain
call 617-794-8208 for information or to register

Our next conscious movie meet up will be on Friday April 6th. It is also Good Friday. For this day we will play ?The Passion of Jesus Christ? the movie directed by Mel Gibson. About the movie, Mel Gibson said, "I want to show the humanity of Christ as well as the divine aspect. It's a rendering that for me is very realistic and as close as possible to what I perceive the truth to be." Among the different sources Mel Gibson used for his movie were the writings of Anne Catherine Emmerich, a 19th century mystic and nun who saw vision?s of Mary and Jesus? passion.

Come and join us on this Holy day to watch the greatest sacrifice and proof of love that was given to us as a gift to human kind.
?You are my friends and the greater love a person can have for his friends is to give his life for them? Jesus Christ
